channel.title: Command level requirement (Basic java knowledge)
channel.description:
Ok i know how to make the levels if statment but how might i make more then one level e.g: playerLevel[0] and maby go all the way down to 8 how might i make this command work like that like i want all these skill levels to be in one code: playerLevel[0] playerLevel[1] playerLevel[2] playerLevel[3] playerLevel[4]
without needing to do many if statments

item.title: Command level requirement (Basic java knowledge)
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

for(int i = 0; i < 8; i++) { if(playerLevel[i] == ##) { } }

Read full topic

item.title: Command level requirement (Basic java knowledge)
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

A for loop?

for (int i = 0; i < playerLevel.length; i++) {
        playerLevel[i] = 8;
}

Read full topic
